pros: I thoroughly enjoyed my time as an Assessor at SGS. My role was to support learners completing their CIPD (Level 3 and 5) apprenticeship. This role was very engaging and rewarding as I was exposed to the full apprenticeship programme and was able to coach the learners right through to completion. When I started my assessing journey I had 10 years HR experience but had never assessed before. The team were very supportive and I always felt I could ask for guidance when needed. Being a part of SGS was great, there was clear direction and the learners were at the heart of everything the College does.
cons: As I was employed on a claims basis, I felt that it took me a while to meet everyone in the team. However this was no fault of SGS, but because I wasn't on site all of the time.

pros: Great Staff, Great students, Generally a positive learning environment
cons: Not enough funding and too big a focus on attendance over achievement
